introduction: Sven (15) wants to be a director and shoots movies frequently. Especially of his friends who are into free running. He asks his friend Roosmarijn to help him make his very first feature film.However, she may never know that he reguarly gets a beating from his dad. Thus far he is able to hide the bruises for everyone until he's so beaten up that he hides himself at grandma's place.Because of that he misses his birthday. Roosmarijn thinks that Sven doesn't like her anymore and also his friends are getting angry at him. One day he decides to deal with his dad once and for all until he finds out why his dad beats him...
